review: This is excellent! The only thing we ever watch on our TV is Hulu and Netflix. Consequently, this is the only device we use! Our TV even has a USB port on it, so we plugged the Chromecast into the USB and HDMI and were all set. Very clean and out of sight. The one power cord to the TV is through the stand and is completely hidden. Very clean.
author: Jonathan Erber
